name: Kaitei Taisensou!! Treasure World
summary: An adventure game where you travel around the world to find your friends and legendary treasures. You can enjoy the real thrill of the eternal theme "Treasure Hunt" that everyone is interested in. In order to break the seal of the ancient civilization, the main character becomes a treasure hunter looking for the ancient civilization that has sunk to the seabed due to crustal movement, and with the hint of the treasure called Great Treasure that sleeps in the seas around the world, the legendary treasure World Treasure Go on a voyage to look for it. Make full use of various items such as a variety of mini games and submarines to raise treasure.
